item.title: Wrong signage., 15th October
item.description:
Signs currently state Width restrictions 6.6 foot for lanes 2 and 3. (Lane 1 and 2 from black prince) Can HGV/Buses use this route, as these Vehicles are over 7 foot. Should there be a straddle sign for Vehicles over 6.6 for use of these section (both lanes) Thank you Gary

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Way, Coldblow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary red light stuck on the Late Ordance Road in St. Johns Wood by the pub., 15th October
item.description:
Temporary red light stuck on the Late Ordance Road in St. John's Wood by the pub. Heading towards St. Johns Wood High Street. This is the second time this week we have had to go through the Red light because its not changing.

item.title: Flytipping....again, 15th October
item.description:
As per photo - someone is flytipping. It has been here many days.bas a resident, I can't even access the bins to dispose of my regular waste because the access is blocked by the flytipping. A long term solution needs to be found.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heath Road, Clapham, London
